resources.string: GPS and SMS are a must permissions, without them the app will crash
Enable the app in the background
Respond to default \"Where are you\" keyword
Respond to my own Secret keyword
Your secret wod is not accepted, you entered nothing, pls recheck
Make notification if received SMS contains the word \"Urgent\".
You received an SMS containing a word of urgency
Unmute and ring the mobile when receiving SMS contains special word
Call-Back mobile when receiving SMS contains special word
Record Telephonic calls \n(Calls are saved in Downloads)
Your call had been recorded, check it in the `Downloads` folder
